column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant | Participants # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=I was headed to visit my cousin in Italy for a few weeks .
#id=2
#text=The week before , my dad went online and purchased me one of those convenient e-tickets .
#id=3
#text=He printed it out and made sure I remembered to bring it on the day of my flight .
#id=4
#text=We arrived early to the airport so that i could go through all of the security checks .
#id=5
#text=I had to take off my shoes and put my belongings in a tray as I went through the scanner .
#id=6
#text=After that , I saw the board with all of the flights and saw that my flight was leaving soon .
#id=7
#text=I waited a few minutes by the gate with my parents until it was time to board .
#id=8
#text=Many passengers climbed aboard and found their seats .
#id=9
#text=The captain greeted us over the loudspeaker and then the plane took off .
#text=I was tired so I took a nap .
#text=When I woke up I could see the clouds around me as we were pretty high up in the air .
#text=After a few more hours we arrived and everyone clapped .
